content: is there such a thing as  Tumblr to desktop image?

Yes, there are tools and methods available to save or download images from Tumblr to your desktop. Here are a few ways you can do this:

1. Save images manually: Right-click on an image you want to save on Tumblr, then select "Save image as" or a similar option. Choose the destination folder on your desktop where you want to save the image and click "Save."

2. Browser extensions: There are browser extensions such as "TumblOne" or "Tumblr Downloader" available for popular web browsers like Chrome, Firefox, or Safari. These extensions allow you to download images, videos, and other media from Tumblr directly to your desktop.

3. Online image downloader: There are websites that let you enter the URL of a Tumblr blog or post and download all the images from that specific page. Simply search for "Tumblr image downloader" online, and you will find several options.

It is important to respect copyright and intellectual property while using these methods, so make sure you have the rights or permissions to download and use the images.
